lead_paragraph: The International Olympic Committee president, Thomas Bach, made upbeat comments 10 months after the I.O.C. vice president John Coates described Brazil’s organization as the “worst ever.”

headline.main: Bach Is ‘Very Satisfied’ With Rio’s Olympic Preparations

snippet: The International Olympic Committee president, Thomas Bach, made upbeat comments 10 months after the I.O.C. vice president John Coates described Brazil’s organization as the “worst ever.”
